Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing the DJ-1 variant c.188G>A (p.R63Q) showed significantly increased levels of reactive oxygen species compared to the control group.

Technical replicates.Description: Technical replicates were not specifically mentioned in the study.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: A basic negative control was not explicitly described in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: ROS levels below a certain baseline, not explicitly defined.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: ROS levels exceeding the baseline, determined statistically with the T-test
